column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I love a good steak as much as the next carnivore
column2: but I can't eat much of it
column3: so I ordered the 6 oz petite duchess filet.  It was the perfect portion for me and cooked medium-well to my liking.  I also ordered the bone marrow
column4: which was good but not necessary.  Bavette's serves up a little tin of their special steak salt - you cannot miss this salt on your steak!
